projects.title: Tea Explorer Website
projects.description: Team project; The Tea Explorer website is the culmination of extensive development efforts, representing my most expansive project to date. Throughout its creation, I delved into various technologies and received invaluable feedback from a talented team of curators. This platform aims to alleviate the consumer challenge of navigating the intricate landscape of teas by offering a user-friendly interface centered around an interactive map.
